alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Fruitland, or near Crescent City, moving south at 10 mph. Other storms were near Satsuma. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Fruitland, Satsuma, Welaka, Lake Como and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
